text: Hi Camilla, so sorry for the late reply. I returned from my geography field trip on Saturday and have been terribly ill since.

:blush: A little bit about myself:
I'm 17 and I'm currently a year 13 A-Level student
The subjects I study are English Literature, Geography, Philosophy and Art
I aspire to become an Architect (if not that, perhaps something in the creative field)
I enjoy spending my time drawing, reading and writing
I love photography so I enjoy being outdoors and taking pictures of beautiful lanscapes
